name: Ancient Gear Gadjiltron Chimera
text:
This card gains the appropriate effects if you Normal Summon it by Tributing these monsters.
â—? Green Gadget: This card gains 300 ATK.
â—? Red Gadget: If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
â—? Yellow Gadget: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Inflict 700 damage to your opponent.
